city.name: Pilgrim's Rest
city.description: somber and enigmatic town. The cobblestone streets are lined with ancient, ivy-covered buildings that whisper tales of a forgotten past.

hands.explanation:
_"Do not hold the pilgrim's hands for he is blinded by faith"_

2 player game played with *3 d6 each*.

Both you & the other player choose a *target number between 3 and 18*, then you roll until someone wins.

If a player gets either *5 or 10 they lose*. If a player gets their *target number* with either *all 3 or just 2 of their dice* they win.

Pays 150% of the pot.

fate.explanation:
_"The pilgrim's fate is to perpetually walk the mortal plane, undying in a dying world... Lucky, some might say..."_

2 player dice game. Roll a d13 3 times.

If a player exceeds 27 they lose.

Wins who gets the highest score without exceeding 27.

open.explanation:
_"Some doors get possessed by fragments of their dead former owners and only open when a word they identified in life with is whispered in the key hole"_

Guess a random word in the given amount of tries.

illusion.explanation:
_"Some walls are mere illusions, but beware of dispelling them, you might not like what they hide..."_

Navigate a maze by typing 'n'(north), 's'(south), 'e'(east) & 'w'(west), or 'i'(idle) for a tick. Moving in a direction moves you until you hit a wall, the exit or an active trap.

You can optionally define the amount of steps you want to take, for example:
`n 2` will walk 2 steps to the north.
`n` will walk north until you hit a wall.

Note that both the previous commands will consume a single turn.

Beware of spike traps that activate & deactivate each turn.

Finish the maze in the given number of turns

war.explanation:
_"If you know the enemy and know yourself you need not fear the results of a hundred battles."_

Choose what troop to deploy at the same time as your opponent.

Cavalry beats Archers
Archers beat Spears
Spears beats Cavalry

trap.explanation:
_"I used to be an adventure like you..."_

Navigate a trap room by typing 'n'(north), 's'(south), 'e'(east) & 'w'(west), or 'i'(idle) for a tick. Avoid getting hit by arrows.

Survive for the given number of turns.

town: visit the tavern together, sharing stories of your adventures.
check out the market stalls together.
play a couple games of the royal game of Ur.
walk on the town walls together, taking in the view.
hunt plague rats with flaming bolts.
visit the smithy together to perform maintenance on your equipment
exchange trinkets you collected during your adventures
spend some time together, enjoying each other's company.
accompany them to the cemetery to mourn your loved ones.
talk about conspiracy theories for an hour. You are convinced they are all true.
greet them tiredly, then you immediately go home where you take an invigorating nap.
spot a Pilgrim watching you two talk. He sees you are bound by the Ouroboros contract. He sees your chains.
kill some time hunting pigeons together.
kill some slimy monsters hiding in the town's sewers.
zones: spend some time around a campfire roasting some freshly hunted small game.
walk together for a bit, sharing knowledge about the area.
silently nod to each other, for there are monsters nearby.
clear the way ahead together, protecting each other from danger.
gather supplies to prepare for the dangers ahead.
polish your equipment in silence, each other's backs
play a couple of games of 'Hands', as it is a traditional game most played by adventurers on a quest.
help them open a particularly stubborn chest. It turns out it was a mimic, so you kill it together.
help each other climb a particularly tall wall.
throw rocks at some monsters below you. They can't reach you and they make funny noises when hit.
share a pemmican & hardtack meal since lighting a fire was not an option.
hide from them until they leave. You are not feeling too sociable right now.
come across a Pilgrim, undying & blindly following the path his faith lays for him. You both watch him, mesmerized.
do the secret adventurer salute. They reciprocate.
trade some supplies.
hide together from a pack of monsters approaching your position
help each other move some debris from a blocked passageway.
carve your names into a wall, as way to leave a mark on this cruel world.
Gossip about other adventurers.
finish off a dying animal & cook it's remains.

mida.name: Mida's touch
mida.description: Create Boromian Alloy from thin air.

bones.name: Bone recall
bones.description: Recall the experiences of the bone's former owner.

displacement.name: Eldritch displacement
displacement.description: Briefly travel through another dimension where time and space are distorted, gaining time on your quest.

glitch.name: Alloy glitch
glitch.description: The next time you earn money the amount will be multiplied by 1.5 times for every 30 power used.

hex.name: Ancient Hex
hex.description: Hex someone of your choosing, they will have a disadvantage finishing their next quest. Send the name after 'hex'. Double the effect if you use 100 power.

bless.name: Ancient Blessing
bless.description: Bless someone of your choosing, they will have an advantage finishing their next quest. Send the name after 'bless'. Triple the effect if you use 100 power.

might.name: Eldritch Might
might.description:
Be much stronger in the next combat.
Effect scales with amount of power used (40 for 1.5x, 80 for 2x, 120 for 2.5x).

swift.name: Eldritch Swiftness
swift.description:
Be much faster in the next combat, ignore weight.
Effect scales with amount of power used (40 for -15 kg, 80 for -30 kg, 120 for -45 kg).

ritual.name: Summoning Ritual
ritual.description:
Enemy in the next encounter is going to be much stronger.
Effect scales with amount of power used (50 for +5 levels, 100 for +10 levels).

choices.success: The chest lays at your feet, destroyed, some of its contents still intact.
choices.failure: You completely destroyed the chest and its contents.

choices.success: You manage to lockpick the chest, preserving its contents.
choices.failure: You fail in your lock picking attempt. The chest remains closed.

choices.success: Miraculously the chest opens with a single kick. You feel very good about yourself.
choices.failure: The kick does nothing. Your foot hurts.

quick time events.description: You hear faint crying coming from a room nearby.

choices.success: You leave, you don't want to get involved.
choices.failure: As soon as you start to leave, the crying stops. You turn around and you see empty eye sockets stalking you. You run.

choices.success: It turns out the crying was coming from a tied-up woman. You untie her and she rewards you with some Alloy.
choices.failure: It turns out the crying was just an hallucination.

quick time events.description: You spot a piece of an artifact at the bottom of a well.

choices.success: The rock hits the piece, shattering it in the process. You don't know why you did that but you are satisfied with your shot.
choices.failure: You miss your shot. You leave, feeling defeated.

choices.option: Descend with the help of a rope
choices.success: You manage to get to the bottom without falling.
choices.failure: As soon as you pull on the rope to test it it snaps. You leave, exhaling a sigh of sadness.

quick time events.description: You stumble upon a man wearing a yellow robe. He does not have facial features.

choices.success: You manage to slip away, undetected.
choices.failure: You feel His presence growing in your mind. Madness overwhelms you.

choices.success: You manage to hide from him inside a nearby horse carcass.
choices.failure: You feel His presence growing in your chest. The growing heat of Chaos overwhelms you.

choices.success: You start running, He ignores you.
choices.failure: You feel his presence growing limbs. The pain overwhelms you.

choices.success: Against all your instincts you lunge at Him, landing a "fatal" blow. He vanishes, leaving behind some treasure.
choices.failure: You are paralyzed by terror.

quick time events.description: You stumble upon a strange lady that offers you a potion, claiming it will make you stronger.

choices.success: You politely refuse & leave her be. You did not trust her.
choices.failure: You rudely ignore her & it turns out she was a powerful Hag. You run.

choices.success: The potion does actually make you feel stronger. You thank the lady and move on.
choices.failure: The potion tastes horrible and apparently has mold in it. The lady laughs & disappears in a puff of smoke.

quick time events.description: You encounter a living doll holding a squid. She insists in calling you "Good Hunter" and asks you to touch her.

choices.success: You touch her & you suddenly feel stronger. She slowly fades away, as if she was a dream all along
choices.failure: You try to touch her but it turns out she was an hallucination all along.

choices.success: You manage to swipe her squid, which starts melting and turns into 3 artifact pieces that kind of look like umbilical cords.
choices.failure: The moment you think of stealing her squid she disappears, as if she was a dream all along.

quick time events.description: Suddenly, everything becomes silent. You are immersed in an endless sea of darkness & silence. A female voice speaks softly: "I AM BOROM. I AM THE PLANET. I AM AFRAID"

choices.success: Whatever this thing is it's freaking you out, you try running but you can't move. You try waking up instead. It works.
choices.failure: You can't run. You can't even move. The voice falls silent but the darkness remains. You wake some time later, covered in sweat.

choices.option: Ask what she is afraid of
choices.success: "DEATH. I NEED YOU TO PROTECT ME FROM DEATH. A PRESENCE INSIDE MY CORE KILLING ME. I NEED YOU. I LOVE YOU." You wake up a few moments later, light headed.
choices.failure: You are terrified and cannot speak. You wake some time later, covered in sweat.

quick time events.description: A talking crow lands on your shoulder and offers to tell you a secret for a piece of bread.

choices.success: The crow reveals a hidden path that leads to a some treasure.
choices.failure: The crow eats the bread and flies away, leaving you with nothing.

choices.success: The crow flies off, and you find a shiny trinket where it was standing.
choices.failure: The crow angrily caws and summons a flock to harass you.

quick time events.description: You encounter a ghost offering to show you a hidden treasure in exchange for your help in finding peace.

choices.success: You help the ghost resolve its unfinished business and it leads you to a hidden room filled with treasure.
choices.failure: Despite your efforts, the ghost remains restless and vanishes, leaving you with nothing but a chill.

choices.success: You ignore the ghost and continue your quest.
choices.failure: The ghost becomes angry and lets out a blood curling scream.

quick time events.description: You encounter a creepy vagabond who offers advice for a small fee of one of your toenails.

choices.success: You rip off one of your toe nails & the guy, looking hungrily at it, gives you valuable advice that helps you avoid a future danger.
choices.failure: The guy is vague and unhelpful. You decide to cut his tongue.

choices.success: You rightfully decide to ignore him.
choices.failure: He lunges at you, scratching you. He runs off on all fours, never to be seen again.

quick time events.description: You find a wounded animal, struggling to move. It seems to be a rare creature around here.

choices.success: The creature recovers and grants you a magical boon as thanks for your kindness.
choices.failure: Despite your efforts, the creature succumbs to its wounds, and you feel sorrowful as it fades away.

choices.success: You move on, not getting involved, and avoid any unnecessary danger.
choices.failure: You later hear the creature’s mournful cry as a predator takes it. You regret your choice.

quick time events.description: You come across a strange well that supposedly grants wishes, but only at a cost.

choices.success: Your wish is granted, and you feel the hopes & dreams of lost adventurers fill you.
choices.failure: The well demands a high price, draining your energy instead of granting the wish.

choices.success: Your wish is granted, pouches full of Boromian Alloy materialize in front of you.
choices.failure: The well demands a high price, draining your energy instead of granting the wish.

choices.success: Your wish is granted, an artifact piece materializes in front of you.
choices.failure: The well demands a high price, draining your energy instead of granting the wish.

choices.success: You avoid the temptation and continue on your journey with no ill effects.
choices.failure: You later regret not making a wish, as a challenge arises that you could have avoided.

quick time events.description: You see an item encased in strange glowing red stone.

choices.success: You manage to break the stone & you take the item with you.
choices.failure: Despite your efforts, the stone won't break.

choices.success: The rock looks unbreakable anyway, you leave.
choices.failure: You later regret your choice as you learn that the item was infused with powerful boons.

quick time events.description: A strange mist fills the path ahead, and a voice beckons you to enter, promising great rewards within.

choices.success: Inside the mist, you find an enchanted grove, filled with rare plants and treasures.
choices.failure: The mist disorients you, and you wander aimlessly for hours before finding your way out, exhausted.

choices.success: You steer clear of the mysterious mist and continue on your journey safely.
choices.failure: Later, you learn that those who braved the mist found valuable treasures.

quick time events.description: A hooded figure offers you a mysterious glowing crystal, claiming it holds untold power.

choices.success: The crystal radiates with energy, enhancing your abilities as you feel a surge of power.
choices.failure: The crystal crumbles to dust in your hands, leaving you with nothing but a sense of loss.

choices.success: You refuse and avoid potential danger, saving your money for something more trustworthy.
choices.failure: Later, you hear rumors that the crystal was real and the buyer became incredibly powerful.

quick time events.description: A traveling bard offers to sing a song about your adventures, claiming it will spread your fame far and wide.

choices.success: The bard's song captivates the crowd, and soon you find yourself more well-known in the region.
choices.failure: The bard’s song is terrible, and you become the laughing stock of the taverns.

choices.success: You avoid unwanted attention and continue on your journey in peace.
choices.failure: Later, you hear another adventurer became famous thanks to the bard’s song.

quick time events.description: You find an old, dusty book in an abandoned library, its pages filled with strange symbols and drawings.

choices.success: The book reveals ancient knowledge, granting you new powers and insights into the arcane.
choices.failure: The symbols confuse and overwhelm you, causing a painful headache before you throw the book aside.

choices.success: You decide to leave the mysterious tome untouched and exit the library unharmed.
choices.failure: Later, you regret not learning what secrets the book could have revealed.

quick time events.description: A mysterious blacksmith offers to forge you a weapon, but demands something of personal value in return.

choices.success: The blacksmith forges a powerful weapon that shimmers with enchantments, empowering you.
choices.failure: The weapon is flawed, and you feel you’ve lost something precious for little gain.

choices.success: Whatever the blacksmith meant for 'something of personal value', you don't like it, so you leave.
choices.failure: You wonder if the blacksmith's weapon could have given you the strength to overcome your next challenge.

vocations.description: No Vocation

vocations.name: Adventurer
vocations.description: Luck alone won't get you anywhere, but it will certainly help.

vocations.name: Adventurer
vocations.description: It’s not the years, honey, it’s the mileage.

vocations.name: Adventurer
vocations.description: The greatest adventure is what lies ahead.

vocations.name: Adventurer
vocations.description: X never, ever marks the spot.

vocations.name: Adventurer
vocations.description: I am not the same, having seen the moon shine on the other side of the world.

vocations.name: Arcanist
vocations.description: Do not call up any that you can not put down.

vocations.name: Arcanist
vocations.description: The world is indeed comic, but the joke is on mankind.

vocations.name: Arcanist
vocations.description: Only poetry or madness could do justice to the noises.

vocations.name: Arcanist
vocations.description: That is not dead which can eternal lie...

vocations.name: Arcanist
vocations.description: ... And with strange aeons even death may die.

vocations.name: Hunter
vocations.description: It is your duty as a member of the Hunters League to dispatch of anything that would be considered vile.

vocations.name: Hunter
vocations.description: My confederate, Promise me you'll crush all vermin, to rid us of our impurities. For the sake of our fellows.

vocations.name: Hunter
vocations.description: My confederate, Promise me you'll crush all vermin, to rid us of our impurities. For the sake of our fellows.

vocations.name: Hunter
vocations.description: Farewell good hunter, may you find your worth in the waking world.

vocations.name: Hunter
vocations.description: It's you... You're the beast... Can't you see what you're doing? It's madness...

vocations.name: Clown
vocations.description: The Gods give their silliest battles to their funniest clowns.

vocations.name: Clown
vocations.description: Honk honk.

vocations.name: Clown
vocations.description: Are you having fun yet?

vocations.name: Clown
vocations.description: You have big shoes to fill.

vocations.name: Clown
vocations.description: You seem pretty funny.

vocations.name: Inquisitor
vocations.description: You shall be a bulwark against heresy.

vocations.name: Inquisitor
vocations.description: A mind without purpose will wander in dark places.

vocations.name: Inquisitor
vocations.description: Put a heretic to the flame and he'll be loyal for the rest of his life.

vocations.name: Inquisitor
vocations.description: The zealous martyr is praised for his valour.

vocations.name: Inquisitor
vocations.description: In the midst of battle you shall have no fear.

vocations.name: Merchant
vocations.description: For the merchant, even honesty is a financial speculation.

vocations.name: Merchant
vocations.description: You speak an infinite deal of nothing.

vocations.name: Merchant
vocations.description: What're ya buyin'?

vocations.name: Merchant
vocations.description: Let's do some business then, eh!

vocations.name: Merchant
vocations.description: All that glisters is not Alloy.

consumables.name: Rotten Strawberry
consumables.description: The mold gives it a fuzzy texture.

consumables.name: Rags
consumables.description: A bundle of clean-ish rags to stop the bleeding with.

consumables.name: Bandage
consumables.description: A sterilized bandage meant to be applied to wounds.

consumables.name: First Aid Kit
consumables.description: A sterilized set of surgical tools & bandages to treat any serious injury.

consumables.name: Strange concoction
consumables.description: A foul smelling concoction that glows orange.

consumables.name: Mutated meat
consumables.description: Pulsating meat that was harvested from something (or someone) mutated by eldritch forces.

consumables.name: Eye of the Idiot God
consumables.description: Gelatinous black eyeball. It smells like death.

consumables.name: Black Apple
consumables.description: Pitch black apple, it absorbs all light.

consumables.name: God skin jerky
consumables.description: Hard & crunchy. Fills you with power.

consumables.name: Bone flavoured ice cream
consumables.description: Ice cream made with the ground up bones of the dead.

consumables.name: Bottled madness
consumables.description: bottled scream of a mad god.

consumables.name: Acidic grease
consumables.description: grease that corrodes any living flesh it touches.

consumables.name: Abyssal Eel entrails
consumables.description: Jar of Abyssal Eel entrails, salted for conservation.

consumables.name: Golden Strawberry
consumables.description: A Juicy strawberry with a peculiar golden color.

consumables.name: God Emperor's blessing
consumables.description: A radiant gem that is warm to the touch. 'Ad Astra per Aspera' is carved on it.'
